code: export var BASE_URL='https://auth.nomoreparties.co';export var register=function register(email,password){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signup"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({"password":password,"email":email})}).then(function(res){return res.json();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};export var authorize=function authorize(email,password){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signin"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({"password":password,"email":email})}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(data){if(data){localStorage.setItem('jwt',data.token);return data;}}).catch(function(error){return console.log(error);});};export var checkToken=function checkToken(token){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/users/me"),{method:'GET',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(data){return data;});};
